feed.title: Birmingham DSA
feed.subtitle: Homepage for the Birmingham Democratic Socialists of America

entry.title: RSVP for Bham DSA’s December general meeting!

link.title: RSVP for Bham DSA’s December general meeting!

entry.content:
Our December general meeting is on Sunday, December 11 at 7:00PM CT!

Get updates from all our chapter organizing, including labor solidarity, mutual aid and socialist feminist organizing, our AfroSocialists section, and much more! This is a great meeting for those who are DSA-curious.

RSVP here for the Zoom info.

category.term: general meeting, labor, mutual aid, housing, afrosocialism, socialist feminism

entry.summary: Our December general meeting is on Sunday, December 11 at 7:00PM CT!

entry.title: Bham DSA November General Meeting
entry.content:
At our November 2022 General Meeting, we’ll share updates from October, discuss committee organizing work, and other various chapter business. RSVP to get the Zoom info and to receive the agenda before the meeting! This meeting will be entirely via Zoom.

Register on Action Network
entry.summary: At our November 2022 General Meeting, we’ll share updates from October, discuss committee organizing work, and other various chapter business. RSVP to get the Zoom info and to receive the agenda before the meeting! This meeting will be entirely via Zoom.

entry.title: Register to volunteer at Birmingham DSA’s November 2022 Brake Light Clinic!

link.title: Register to volunteer at Birmingham DSA’s November 2022 Brake Light Clinic!

entry.content:
Register on Action Network to volunteer at Birmingham DSA’s Brake Light Clinic on Saturday, November 19 from 1:30-4:00PM at Birmingham Mutual Aid (30 9th Court West, 35204).

Training for volunteers will begin at 1:00PM, also at Birmingham Mutual Aid.

Register on Action Network
entry.summary: Register on Action Network to volunteer at Birmingham DSA’s Brake Light Clinic on Saturday, November 19 from 1:30-4:00PM at Birmingham Mutual Aid (30 9th Court West, 35204).
